name: Mia Hotel
address: 155 Đường Calmette, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm tại vị trí thuận tiện ở Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Mia Hotel nằm cách Bảo tàng Mỹ thuật chỉ vài bước chân, Trung tâm mua sắm Takashimaya Việt Nam 7 phút đi bộ và Chợ Bến Thành 700 m. Ngoài Wi-Fi miễn phí, khách sạn 1 sao này còn cung cấp phòng chờ chung và sân hiên. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng, quầy lễ tân 24 giờ và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Tất cả các phòng đi kèm điều hòa, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, tủ lạnh, ấm đun nước, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và bàn làm việc. Ngoài phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen và máy sấy tóc, một số phòng tại khách sạn cũng có view thành phố. Tại Mia Hotel, các phòng đều có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, kiểu Á hoặc món chay mỗi buổi sáng.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Công viên Tao Đàn, Bảo tàng Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh và Ủy ban nhân dân Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất, cách Mia Hotel 7 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm thuận tiện, phòng sạch sẽ
review.comment_negative: Phòng còn bị ảnh hưởng tiếng ồn nhiều

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_negative: Đang hoàng

review.rating: Tuyệt vời, cả chủ khách sạn và nhân viên
review.comment_positive: Chủ khách sạn rất nhiệt tình, dễ thương
Good location, clean room, quiet; very helpful staf; uou have to order breafast one day in advance-but ok.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Perfect location at a budget price
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly and went above and beyond for us. Motel Waa lovely and clean. Great value for money
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Great location, very clean with comfortable bed. Breakfast was good too.
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Property is very clean. The shower was large & bed was comfortable. We really appreciated that they allowed us to take a shower before our night bus.
review.comment_negative: Most of the staff don't speak English, and so we had a communication issue at check in. But they did resolved it quickly and were very nice about it. The receptionist at night speaks English well though.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Wonderful location so close to great restaurants and main sites, on a quiet street. Staff are wonderful and go out of their way to help.  No questions its the best value.
Everything i like 👍 ♥

I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel.
It was easy to find, close to the bustling centre of HCMC and set in a quiet street in a nice area. I was welcomed from the moment I walked through the front door and this was the theme over the next few days. Lots of gestures and Google Translate made communication very manageable.
The room was just right, spacious enough, nice bed, excellent shower and very clean and tidy.
I enjoyed the breakfast here, it was lovely. It was served in a room filled with morning sunlight and there are two options, both very good. Pho or omelette, both served with fruit, yogurt, tea and coffee. A simple and good start to the day.
I cannot emphasise enough the friendliness of the staff. I felt sad on leaving!
review.comment_negative: I liked everything about the hotel.

review.comment_positive: Rooms are clean, breakfast was basic but good. Room was better then photos showed. It's in walking distance to everything in 1st district. It was a good value for money.

review.rating: Perfect location at a budget price

review.rating: Great location, very clean with comfortable bed. Breakfast was good too.
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Property is very clean. The shower was large & bed was comfortable. We really appreciated that they allowed us to take a shower before our night bus.
review.comment_negative: Most of the staff don't speak English, and so we had a communication issue at check in. But they did resolved it quickly and were very nice about it. The receptionist at night speaks English well though.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Wonderful location so close to great restaurants and main sites, on a quiet street. Staff are wonderful and go out of their way to help.  No questions its the best value.
Everything i like 👍 ♥

I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel.
It was easy to find, close to the bustling centre of HCMC and set in a quiet street in a nice area. I was welcomed from the moment I walked through the front door and this was the theme over the next few days. Lots of gestures and Google Translate made communication very manageable.
The room was just right, spacious enough, nice bed, excellent shower and very clean and tidy.
I enjoyed the breakfast here, it was lovely. It was served in a room filled with morning sunlight and there are two options, both very good. Pho or omelette, both served with fruit, yogurt, tea and coffee. A simple and good start to the day.
I cannot emphasise enough the friendliness of the staff. I felt sad on leaving!
review.comment_negative: I liked everything about the hotel.

review.comment_positive: Rooms are clean, breakfast was basic but good. Room was better then photos showed. It's in walking distance to everything in 1st district. It was a good value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King

review.comment_negative: Phòng còn bị ảnh hưởng tiếng ồn nhiều
